hypothesis_content.title: BTC Regime Transition Momentum Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime (as defined by FjordHQ regime classifier), a sharp 8%+ price surge within 48 hours will be followed by a mean-reversion pullback of 3-5% within the next 5 trading days, providing a short-term counter-trend entry opportunity.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Initial regime transitions often trigger emotional/mechanical buying (CTAs, trend-followers). Overbought conditions in early bull phases tend to correct as weak hands take profits before institutional accumulation resumes.
entry_conditions: BTC price increases ≥8% within 48 hours post-transition
Volume surge ≥150% of 20-day average during the rally

exit_conditions.stop_loss: New high beyond the rally peak (confirmation of continued momentum)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 5 trading days if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >70% of such transitions continue straight up without the 3-5% pullback (measured over next 20 instances).
